/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Trees line the sides of the road, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the scene. Buildings rise in the background, their windows reflecting the sunlight. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings and trees, which adds a sense of grandeur to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass standing out against the blue sky and the various colors of the buildings and vehicles.
